attacks.name: Cheer Up
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If Minun is in play, draw 2 cards instead.

attacks.name: Positive Ion
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Body Bolt
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-bodies. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
